name: WRAITHVERGE
on_attack: Firing WRAITHVERGE is extremely taxing on your frame. Immediately reduce structure and stress by one. If you are already at 1 structure or stress, you may not fire WRAITHVERGE.
on_hit: Create a Line 5 path from (but not including) your target, continuing in the same direction as the attack. Characters in this path take 5 Kinetic Damage.
description: A terrifying weapon leftover from a war that never was. MECHANICS ARE ALL TBD. BUYER BEWARE.
